title: Realizing the potential of gene therapy for neurological disorders

title_detail.value: Realizing the potential of gene therapy for neurological disorders

summary: Promising findings from preclinical animal studies show the potential of gene therapy for treating incurable neurological disorders. Scientists have successfully used gene therapy to slow the progression and improve symptoms of disorders such as amyotrophic lateral sclerosis and Parkinson's disease.
